---
title: "Calendar"
---


The calendar below lists the tentative course topics. The dates listed are subject to change at the instructor's discretion.

As part of the course, there are several articles, papers and technical reports that you will need to read during the semester. Most of the articles themselves are accessible through the [University of Minnesota library website](http://www.lib.umn.edu). In order to access the full text of some of the articles, you will need to log in using your University x500 username and password.

You can see the underlying Quarto source code at <https://zief0002.github.io/adv-modeling/>. You can also [download a ZIP folder](https://github.com/zief0002/adv-modeling/archive/refs/heads/main.zip) of the full project directory, including all QMD documents and other files, used to create the Advanced Modeling book.
